title: Uniworld receives “Food & Travel” and “Cruise International” awards - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Uniworld receives “Food & Travel” and “Cruise International” awards Published on : Friday, September 18, 2015
Uniworld Boutique River Cruise Collection has three reasons to celebrate this week having won awards at two prestigious ceremonies in London, England. Having picked up the “River Cruise Line of the Year” as well as the highly sought-after overall “Cruise Line of the Year” at the Food & Travel Reader Awards on September 14, the success continued at the Cruise International Awards on September 15 as Uniworld’s newest flagship, the S.S. Maria Theresa was named the “Best New River Cruise Ship.” The awards for both ceremonies were voted for by readers of the respective magazines.
The Food & Travel Reader Awards were held at the prestigious Royal Automobile Club on London’s Pall Mall and honors the best in the world of restaurants and worldwide travel. Cruise International, considered to be the leading authority in UK cruise publishing, held its awards in London’s stylish Ham Yard Hotel with celebrities including actress Michelle Collins, former BBC Royal Correspondent Jennie Bond and Eurovision winner Cheryl Baker in attendance.
Kathryn Beadle, Managing Director of Uniworld UK, stated, “This has been a fantastic week for Uniworld with three highly prestigious awards. These awards come towards the end of a great year for Uniworld and I’m delighted that the latest addition to the Uniworld fleet, the S.S. Maria Theresa, has been recognised for its stunning design, personal touches and attention to detail. The experience onboard the S.S. Maria Theresa is the embodiment of all that Uniworld represents: unparalleled luxury, comfort and sophistication; fine dining; and the highest levels of service from a dedicated, highly trained team. It is wonderful these qualities are touching a chord with the discerning readers of these popular magazines.”
